00042     public function Validate (  )
00052         {
00053                 $errors = new Errors ();
00054         
00055                 // variable name
00056                         if ( empty( $this->row[ TableSite::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME ] ) )
00057                         {
00058                                 $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( SiteError::SITE_NAME_EMPTY, 'Please fill in site name.') );
00059                         }
00060                 
00061                 // result
00062                 if ( $errors->GetCount() == 0 )
00063                 {
00064                         $this->isValid = true;
00065                         return NULL;            
00066                 }
00067                 
00068                 
00069                 $this->isValid = false;
00070                 return $errors;
00071         } //----- End of Validate

00084     {

00092                 {

00097                 }
